arknights_stages.description:
The enemy's Arts Master drones are highly maneuverable and capable of launching Arts attacks from above. Counter them with our newly developed Drone Jammer. 
@lv.itemJammer can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

arknights_stages.name: Surprise Attack
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
The cost of the Jammer is doubled

arknights_stages.description:
Frost Drones greatly reduce the Attack Speed of our nearby units. Counter them with operators or Jammers to prevent them from using their abilities. 
@lv.itemJammer can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

arknights_stages.name: In Life and in Death
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
Sniper and Caster Operators may not be deployed.

arknights_stages.name: Intimate Knowledge
arknights_stages.description:
A group of strange enemy soldiers with regeneration abilities have arrived on the battlefield. Eliminate them as quickly as possible. Arrange your deployment to avoid enemy Turrets. 
@lv.itemTurrets periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical Damage to our units.

arknights_stages.name: Intimate Knowledge
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
The DEF of enemy units is increased significantly

arknights_stages.description:

@lv.itemTurrets periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical Damage to our units.

arknights_stages.name: The Devil
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:

arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:

arknights_stages.description: Victories are short, but wars are long, and our enemies are unknown.

arknights_stages.description: Heavily-armored Infected hosts have appeared in Lungmen's urban districts. Not only are they able to shrug off most blows, but they are also capable of regenerating. Exercise caution when dealing with them.

arknights_stages.name: Deadlock
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
Deployment limit is reduced by 2.

arknights_stages.name: Misunderstandings
arknights_stages.description: What kind of abominations are those?! New, grotesque Infected combatants have been seen throughout the combat zones of Lungmen. Their speed and power greatly exceed that of regular hosts, so please be careful!

arknights_stages.name: Misunderstandings
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
The Attack Speed of enemy units is increased significantly

arknights_stages.description: The ranks of these aggressive hosts continue to grow, and they will soon apply heavy pressure to our formation. However, their lives seem to also be quickly burning out

arknights_stages.name: Lost at Once
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
Enemy Enraged Possessed Soldiers have greatly increased ATK.

arknights_stages.description: This area is under attack by aggressive hosts that hurl projectiles at us. Please beware of their long-range attacks.

arknights_stages.name: Festering Scars
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
Enemy Enraged Possessed Throwers have greatly increased HP.

arknights_stages.description:

Enemy Enraged Possessed Units no longer lose HP over time.

@lv.itemTurrets periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical Damage to our units.

arknights_stages.description: The legendary Yeti Squadron, an elite anti-Ursus squad of Infected, has appeared in a Chernobog sub-city. Their fighting style is unlike any Reunion forces we've encountered before, so make sure not to underestimate them.

arknights_stages.name: It Fell From the Sky!
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
The Speed of enemy units is increased significantly

arknights_stages.description: Learn about the 'Cold' and 'Frozen' status effects.

arknights_stages.description: The Yeti Squadron, in addition to fielding casters that specialize in ice-based Arts, has also released Originium Slugs that explode in a shower of rime upon death. Please exercise caution.

arknights_stages.name: Different Perspective
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
Yeti Squadron units and Frostfangs deal even more damage against Frozen units.

arknights_stages.name: Bells of Liberation
arknights_stages.description: The icecleavers, a special group of combatants of the Yeti Squad, deal massive damage to frozen Operators. Stay calm when fighting them.

arknights_stages.name: Snow Upon the Tundra
arknights_stages.description:

arknights_stages.name: Frost Upon the Tundra
arknights_stages.description:
@lv.fsCondition:
Enemy Oneiros drones have greatly increased movement speed.

However, before they can even take two steps out the door, the temporary truce falls apart violently. Such is the life of bounty hunters.

arknights_stages.description:
Exterminate the Reunion combatants that have invaded Lungmen, and regain initiative within the region. 
 DP will not regenerate naturally.

arknights_stages.name: The Grand Knight Territory Outskirts
arknights_stages.description:
A large-scale competitive exhibition game organized by the Kazimierz General Chamber of Commerce. As a defender, Rhodes Island must make use of sponsor drones to deal with the Knightclubs elites. 
 DP will not regenerate naturally.

arknights_stages.name: Frozen Abandoned City
arknights_stages.description:
An abandoned nomadic city hiding the well-organized Reunion guerrillas in the tundras of Ursus. Be prepared for the deathly chill, as that is your only hope for victory. 
 DP will not regenerate naturally
